import React from 'react' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import { addQuantity, subQuantity } from '../Redux/Action' import PriceCard from './PriceCard' class BillCard extends React.Component { render() { let { cartArr, subQuantity,addQuantity,rest} = this.props return (
{rest.name}
{cartArr?.map(elem=> )}
Bill details
) } } const mapStateToProps = state => ({ cartArr:state.cartArr, rest:state.rest }) const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => ({ addQuantity : (payload) => dispatch(addQuantity(payload)), subQuantity : (payload) => dispatch(subQuantity(payload)) }) export default connect(mapStateToProps,mapDispatchToProps)(BillCard)
